thread.title: Sabic's Polymershapes and AgiLight, Inc. Sign Distribution Agreement
thread.title_full: Sabic's Polymershapes and AgiLight, Inc. Sign Distribution Agreement

author: Jon Di Gesu
title: Sabic's Polymershapes and AgiLight, Inc. Sign Distribution Agreement
text:
AgiLight, Inc. a leading manufacturer of high performing LED (light emitting diode) signage lighting systems signed a distribution agreement with SABIC’s Polymershapes distribution business, one of the world’s largest distributors of plastic, sheet, rod, tube, film, LED image lighting and associated products. Under the agreement, Polymershapes, a unit of SABIC’s Innovative Plastics business, will resell AgiLight®’s complete lines of SignRayz® PRO and BoxRayz® series of LED module products, and LED Power Supplies for signage illumination in the United States of America, Mexico, and Canada. “By adding AgiLight®’s LED product offering, SABIC is able to bring technically superior and high quality LED signage lighting products, at a better value, to our customer base,” said Rick Gough, Director of Sales for Polymershapes. “This allows us to provide our 35,000 customers a complete choice in signage and display lighting solutions through our 75+ branch network and, at the same time, expand our total product offering to satisfy fast-growing global demand.”
AgiLight® is an established LED signage lighting brand in North America, Europe, Latin & South America and the Middle East. The company’s products are known for their long life, reliability, advanced optics and quality performance.
With VersaLenz® advanced optics, the SignRayz® PRO Series LEDs improves signage lighting quality with better uniformity and increased brightness, resulting in over 50% reduction of LED modules per sign while delivering the lowest energy consumption LED system cost on the market.
The BoxRayz® LED system provides a high-efficiency and cost-effective solution to replace fluorescent lamps. The constant current power supply and high power LEDs generate 25% higher system efficiency than conventional systems, delivering 400 lumens per module at an efficacy of 92 lumens per watt. First to industry, BoxRayz's® plug-and-play interconnection simplifies the installation and reduces labor cost for sign makers and end-users.
AgiLight®’s Class 1 and Class 2 LED power supplies are high performance power solutions for signage and other outdoor applications. They feature a wide input voltage range 100-277V AC with active power factor correction. Designed with multiple protection functions for wide operating temperatures of between -40°C to +60°C, AgiLight® LED power supplies are highly reliable and deliver maintenance savings to end-users.
“AgiLight® has the product breadth, value proposition and technological leadership as a major LED lighting player in the global signage market. Today’s agreement with distribution leader, SABIC positions us for rapid growth,” said Paul Southard, Managing Director of AgiLight, Inc., “In addition, SABIC’s fabrication capabilities enhance this partnership in the areas of new product and market development.”
About AgiLight®, Inc.
Founded in 2003, AgiLight® is a leading LED lighting manufacturer for commercial signage market. AgiLight develops and produces LED lighting systems for signage, merchandising and point of sale applications. AgiLight’s product families include SignRayz® PRO series LED modules, BoxRayz® LED systems, and LED power supplies. AgiLight has developed new technologies to enhance the signage illumination, including ONEwhite® for global color consistency, VersaLenz® for high optical efficiency, and Capzul® for waterproof LED module encapsulation. AgiLight, Inc. is a wholly owned subsidiary of General LED, Inc. For more information, please refer to http://www.agilight.com
About SABIC
Saudi Basic Industries Corporation (SABIC) ranks as the world’s third largest diversified chemical company. The company is among the world’s market leaders in the production of polyethylene, polypropylene and other advanced thermoplastics, glycols, methanol and agri-nutrients.
About SABIC Polymershapes LLC
Polymershapes is one of the world’s largest distributors of plastic sheet, rod, tube, film and associated products, with 70+ years of industry-leading heritage, providing:
 Innovative solutions for our customer’s material requirements and applications, delivered by 75+ stocking branches Serving 35,000 customers, in thousands of industries, with consistency, accuracy and integrity Expert capabilities: Cut-to-size, fabrication, machining, film conversion and much more Same-day delivery from the industry’s largest inventory – thousands of quality products from trusted manufacturers Polymershapes is a unit of SABIC’s Innovative Plastics business. For more information, please visit http://www.sabicpolymershapes.com .
